product.summary: A suite of web based open source business apps
The ultimate Free Open Source Solution for team communications
The online home for your community
The ultimate Free Open Source Solution for team communications
A self-hosted Slack-alternative, flexible, messaging platform

overview.overview: Chatwoot gives you all the tools to manage conversations, build relationships and delight your customers from one place.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Chatwoot can be self-hosted or used as a service, and it supports features such as automated responses, conversation continuity, and integration with other tools. The open-source nature of Chatwoot means that it can be customized to fit the specific needs of a business, and it allows developers to contribute to the project and extend its functionality.
